thread.title: Disneyland Is Transforming Fantasyland Into Belle's 'Provincial Town' For A Limited-Time! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI
thread.title_full: Disneyland Is Transforming Fantasyland Into Belle's 'Provincial Town' For A Limited-Time! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI

title: Disneyland Is Transforming Fantasyland Into Belle's 'Provincial Town' For A Limited-Time! | Qui West | 99.1 KGGI

organizations.name: disneyland is transforming fantasyland into belle

text:
A post shared by Disneyland (@disneyland) on Sep 5, 2016 at 9:56am PDT 
Source: Instagram 
Beauty and the Beast fans get excited! Disneyland park goers are going to experience Fantasyland in a whole new way as the story of this Disney classic comes to life. 
The Village Haus Restaurant will become the Red Rose Taverne! The inside will be decorated with murals from scenes from the film and each room will tell a different chapter from the storyline. The menu will be delicious quick service meals and yes you'll be able to try the "Grey Stuff." All very similar to the Be Our Guests restuarnate at Walt Disney World in Florida. 
In addition to Red Rose Taverne it looks like Maurice's Treats Snack Cart will have an update. Marinara, strawberry and Grey Stuff dipping sauces will be available to be paired with the bread sticks. So, exciting! 
Hopefully you'll even run into Gaston who will be making appearances in Fantasyland. And don't forget to check out the Royal Reception where there will be special merchandise inspired by the original film and the upcoming live-action version. 
This all sounds so fun! Can't wait to be their guest! Limited-time "Beauty and the Beast" experiences coming to Fantasyland at @Disneyland park: https://t.co/lJMj5g9aDX pic.twitter.com/0lUnBA76ma â€” Disney Parks (@DisneyParks) February 14, 2017 Qui West began his radio journey in 2006 as an intern in San Francisco where he developed a love for radio. From there, he became a public affairs host and landed a weekend on air spot with KYLD Wild 949. The he hit the majors and worked at Houston's legendary hip hop station KBXX 979 The Box. Qui West hosted the No.1 rated night show in the market for almost 4 years. Most recently, he was home in San Francisco at KRBQ 102. Now he has a new home, right here in the I.E. on 99.1 KGGI. Join him every afternoon from 2-6p and follow him everywhere @QuiWest. Contact
